description: I Want Something Big:  What Jim Hughes and Ray Todd do to willing young Donny is not to be believed!  The lean blond is forced to take these powerfully built guys both orally and anally, along wiht an assortment of huge tools and toys.  But it isn't until he's impaled on Jim's fist and arm that Donny's desire for 'something big' is satisfied.
title: Workmen's Compensation
